title: Metamorphosis (Homage to Kafka)
medium: metal screen and paint on wood
provenance_text:
Manuel Rivera [1927-1994], Madrid, Spain; Pierre Matisse Gallery, New York, NY, until December 1964 [1]; purchased by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1965 [2].

Notes: 
[1]. The painting was no. 215 in "The 1964 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1964 - January 1965. It was lent by Pierre Matisse Gallery, New York, NY.
[2]. The painting won the Kaufmann Purchase Award at the 1964 International. Payment to Pierre Matisse Gallery was sent on December 10, 1964. The painting was accessioned the following year, on May 11, 1965.
